segments.text: What's the deal with the Asia area sales ? Did you have a chance to look at any other reports that came in from the branch offices ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We got numbers back from our offices in Beijing , Hong Kong , Taipei , Singapore and Tokyo , we're waiting on Bangkok and Kula Lumpur .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do the preliminary figures tell you ? Any kinds of trends going on for the branches in the Far East ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to say , because the branches are located in diversity different countries , cultural and social influences will definitely play a part in the success of the product in the various markets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For instance , some products that do very well in Tokyo branch are a flop in Malaysia.We ' re talking about different people with different lifestyles and different needs . Each of the branches takes these types of things into consideration when they compile their reports and their marketing plans .
segments.speaker: S2
